verification.title: Email Verification
verification.subject: Verify Your Email Address
verification.message: Thank you for signing up. Please use the following verification code to complete your registration: {verificationCode}
verification.footer: If you did not request this verification, please ignore this email.

welcome.title: Welcome to Nestjs
welcome.subject: Welcome to Nestjs
welcome.message: Thank you for joining Nestjs. We're excited to have you on board!
welcome.footer: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

forgot-password.title: Reset Your Password
forgot-password.subject: Reset Your Password
forgot-password.message: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password. This link will expire in {expireTime} minutes.
forgot-password.footer: If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email or contact support if you have concerns.
